Karnataka Science Exhibition.description: Annual state-level science exhibition for students to showcase innovative projects.

Junior Programming Contest.description: Programming competition designed for young students to learn coding basics.

Pratibha Karanji.description: Karnataka's state-level talent search competition for students covering arts, culture, and academics.

Young Scientist Fair.description: Exhibition for young science enthusiasts to display their projects and innovations.

Robotic Workshop for Beginners.description: Introductory hands-on workshop for students to learn basics of robotics.

Mathematics Olympiad.description: State-level mathematics competition for school students.

Junior Hackathon.description: A fun coding event designed for young students to solve simple programming challenges.

Science Model Exhibition.description: Platform for students to showcase their science models and innovations.

Design Thinking Workshop.description: Interactive workshop teaching young students the basics of design thinking.

Young Artists Showcase.description: Art exhibition and competition for young artists across Karnataka.
